short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Taboover allows you to manage your inactive tabs and keep your browser organised!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Taboover allows you to manage your tab bar more effectively by removing the least popular tabs.  I myself have a habit of searching the web and end up with a tab bar that is squashed and illegible.  Most of these tabs are probably forgotten about anyway...  Tell Taboover your how many tabs you want at any one time and it will take care of the rest for you!
